channel.title: Comments on: Surprise Cakes – Daring Bakers Challenge July 2014

item.title: By: Sunita
item.dc:creator: Sunita
item.description: What a pretty looking cake. Loved the ruffles on the outside. Can imagine why you must have been tired.
item.content:encoded: What a pretty looking cake. Loved the ruffles on the outside. Can imagine why you must have been tired.

item.title: By: Isabella
item.dc:creator: Isabella
item.description: Lovely looking cake, great heart in the middle and beautifully decorated. Especially like the icing flowers, well done :)
item.content:encoded: Lovely looking cake, great heart in the middle and beautifully decorated. Especially like the icing flowers, well done ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Mangomoo
item.dc:creator: Mangomoo
item.description: I normally don't comment and am not a frilly girl but this is so pretty! You are so talented I look forward to your updates all the way in Malawi!
item.content:encoded: I normally don’t comment and am not a frilly girl but this is so pretty! You are so talented I look forward to your updates all the way in Malawi!

item.title: By: Maggie
item.dc:creator: Maggie
item.description: Wow! It's wonderful and so much work!! Don't know how you have the patience but well done :)
item.content:encoded: Wow! It’s wonderful and so much work!! Don’t know how you have the patience but well done ðŸ™‚
